<CommonShellSettings xmlns="http://schemas.aspentech.com/xaml/presentation/visualisation/commonshell" xmlns:atapi="clr-namespace:AspenTech.AspenPlus.Infrastructure;assembly=AspenTech.AspenPlus.Infrastructure" xmlns:assembly="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns:atapmaa="clr-namespace:AspenTech.AspenPlus.Modules.ApwnApplication;assembly=ApwnShell" xmlns:atapie="clr-namespace:AspenTech.AspenPlus.Infrastructure.Events;assembly=AspenTech.AspenPlus.Infrastructure" xmlns:s="clr-namespace:System;assembly=mscorlib" xmlns:apmab="clr-namespace:AspenPlus.Modules.ApwnBrowser;assembly=ApwnShell" xmlns:cxv="http://schemas.aspentech.com/xaml/presentation/cxsviewmodel"><CommonShellSettings.CurrentWorkspace><ShellWorkspace ActivationBarState="<DashboardPanel IsExpanded="false" IsTurnedOff="false" Version="39">
 <Item Type="AspenTech.ActivationDashboard.EconomicAnalysis.DashboardItem">&lt;!--This is the current state of Economics Analysis Dashboard--&gt;
&lt;Root&gt;
 &lt;OnOffState Value="Off" /&gt;
 &lt;CapitalCost Value="" Units="USD" /&gt;
 &lt;UtilityCost Value="" Units="USD/Year" /&gt;
 &lt;HasError&gt;false&lt;/HasError&gt;
 &lt;_statusCode Value="-1" /&gt;
 &lt;Flags&gt;
 &lt;_isRunCompleted Value="false" /&gt;
 &lt;_isRunning Value="false" /&gt;
 &lt;_incompleteButActivated Value="false" /&gt;
 &lt;_incompleteButLoaded Value="false" /&gt;
 &lt;_incompleteButSized Value="false" /&gt;
 &lt;_incompleteButMapped Value="false" /&gt;
 &lt;_completeEvaluatedNotAutoRun Value="false" /&gt;
 &lt;_isSimulationChanged Value="false" /&gt;
 &lt;_isInStopping Value="false" /&gt;
 &lt;_isOnOffButtonCanBeUsed Value="false" /&gt;
 &lt;_isResetDashboardButLeaveItOn Value="true" /&gt;
 &lt;/Flags&gt;
&lt;/Root&gt;</Item>
 <Item Type="AspenTech.ActivationDashboard.EnergyAnalysis.DashboardItem">&lt;!--This is the current state of Energy Analysis Dashboard--&gt;
&lt;Root&gt;
 &lt;IsExpanded&gt;false&lt;/IsExpanded&gt;
 &lt;OnOff&gt;Off&lt;/OnOff&gt;
 &lt;Status&gt;InputIncomplete&lt;/Status&gt;
 &lt;PUS&gt;&lt;/PUS&gt;
 &lt;Percent&gt;&lt;/Percent&gt;
 &lt;Units&gt;MW&lt;/Units&gt;
&lt;/Root&gt;</Item>
 <Item Type="AspenTech.ActivationDashboard.EdrActivation.DashboardItem">&lt;EDR&gt;
 &lt;IsShowModelStatus&gt;false&lt;/IsShowModelStatus&gt;
 &lt;IsShowRiskStatus&gt;false&lt;/IsShowRiskStatus&gt;
 &lt;IsShowLegend&gt;false&lt;/IsShowLegend&gt;
 &lt;DetailCount&gt;0&lt;/DetailCount&gt;
&lt;/EDR&gt;</Item>
